Serialized Form

  • Package gui

    • Class gui.GameFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gpanel

          GamePanel gpanel
          The JPanel which is used for displaying the words.

        • infogame

          javax.swing.JPanel infogame
          The JPanel which contains the current information of the game.

        • typed

          javax.swing.JLabel typed
          The JLabel which displays the word selected at the moment.

        • level

          javax.swing.JLabel level
          The JLabel which displays the current level of game.

        • Music

          javax.swing.JToggleButton Music
          The JToggleButton for enabling of disabling the background music.

        • separatore

          java.awt.Component separatore
          The invisible Component which creates a distance between two labels.

        • volume

          javax.swing.JSlider volume
          The JSlides that could set the music volume.

        • punteggio

          javax.swing.JLabel punteggio
          The JLable which displays the player score.

    • Class gui.GameOver extends javax.swing.JDialog implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • contentPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel contentPanel
          The panel of the JDialog.

        • gameover

          javax.swing.ImageIcon gameover
          The ImageIcon which displays a gif image.

        • imglabel

          javax.swing.JLabel imglabel
          The label used to display the ImageIcon gameover.

        • tryAgain

          javax.swing.JButton tryAgain
          The buttons "Try Again" and "Exit".

        • exit

          javax.swing.JButton exit
          The buttons "Try Again" and "Exit".

        • ExitListener

          ButtonListener ExitListener
          The button listeners associated with the "Exit" and "Try Again" buttons.

        • TryAgainListener

          ButtonListener TryAgainListener
          The button listeners associated with the "Exit" and "Try Again" buttons.

    • Class gui.GamePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • index

          int index
          The number of words already created and showed minus 1 (index of an array).

        • lev1

          int lev1
          Attribute which lets create a new word only after 3 times.

        • ascissa

          int ascissa
          Attributes used for returning the x-axis and the y-axis of a word.

        • ordinata

          int ordinata
          Attributes used for returning the x-axis and the y-axis of a word.

        • go

          boolean go
          A boolean which can stop the game if it's set to false or run it if it's set to true.

        • speed

          int speed
          The speed of the words.

        • parole

          StringWord[] parole
          Array which contains the words.

        • WM

          WordManager WM
          The WordManager reference in order to obtain the words.

        • Sfondo

          java.awt.Color Sfondo
          The background color of the panel.

        • sel

          javax.swing.JLabel sel
          Attributes used to get the labels typed and punteggio.

        • pt

          javax.swing.JLabel pt
          Attributes used to get the labels typed and punteggio.

        • GPL

          GPListener GPL
          The GamePanel events listener.

        • dialog

          GameDialog<dialog> dialog
          JDialog which implements either the GameOver or the Winner dialog using the java generics.
          See Also:
          GameDialog, GameOver, Winner
